  .. index::

     single: immediately causally upstream of; RO_0002412

RO_0002412 - immediately causally upstream of
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for immediately causally upstream of

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    p is immediately causally upstream of q iff both (a) p immediately precedes q and (b) p is causally upstream of q. In addition, the output of p  must be an input of q.


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    Chris Mungall
